name: Gaugan2 Better UI
description:
--Fix Gaugan2 not so attractive UI
--This website is the browser version of NVIDIA Canvas https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/studio/canvas
--Gaugan2 website http://gaugan.org/gaugan2/
additional_info:
What is GauGAN2?
GauGAN2 combines segmentation mapping, inpainting and text-to-image generation in a single model, making it a powerful tool to create photorealistic art with a mix of words and drawings.
